goal.ch:
1. Python程式設計
2. Python第三方函式庫

outline.ch:
【請留意】
本課程第一週為遠距上課，Webex網址：https://ncu-edu.webex.com/meet/ckchang
1、課程簡介、Python簡介、Github操作教學(1)
2、認識變數與基本數學運算、Github操作教學(2)
3、Python數值資料型態、Python運算子、隨機分配學習小組、Github操作教學(3)
4、Python文字資料型態與成員運算子、基本輸入與輸出
5、程式的流程控制-條件判斷、程式的流程控制-迴圈
6、串列(List)、元組(Tuple)
7、字典(Dict)
8、集合(Set)
9、期中考
10、函數(Function)設計
11、函數(Function)引數
12、匿名函數與變數可見度
13、模組(Module)設計與使用
14、檔案的讀寫與組織管理
15、異常處理
16、期末考
17、期末個人跨領域專題
18、期末個人跨領域專題
======
注意事項：
1. 本課程為英文教材
2. 課程Github repository：https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/1111-python-programming，開學後此Github repository將設為private，並以學校email帳號邀請修課同學加入此repository
3. 課程Github community討論區：https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/Python-Community/discussions，本Community將持續公開
4. 修課同學需隨時留意Github的課程訊息公告並配合線上練習與相關作業要求，部分課程內容與學習指引可能隨時做滾動式調整
5. 教材瀏覽、作業繳交、互動討論、分組討論均透過Github管理，修課同學需註冊Github免費會員並使用Github參與課程討論
6. 有筆電的同學可自備筆電上課，亦可使用電腦教室電腦完成各項作業
7. 為即時了解同學線上學習情形，本課程有收集修課同學線上學習記錄分析研究之必要
8. 尊重智慧財產權，使用網路多媒體素材需經過授權
9. 「請假、缺席、扣分」依「國立中央大學學則」第四條之規定辦理
10. 密碼卡說明：https://ncuedu.tw/borglab/priority_passcode_card
outline.en:
【Please Note】
The first week of this course will be conducted remotely. The link of Webex：https://ncu-edu.webex.com/meet/ckchang
1. Course Introduction, Python Overview, Github Operation Tutorial (1)
2. Introduction to Variables and Basic Mathematical Operations, Github Operation Tutorial (2)
3. Python Numeric Data Types, Python Operators, Random Group Assignment, Github Operation Tutorial (3)
4. Python String Data Types and Membership Operators, Basic Input and Output
5. Program Flow Control - Conditional Statements, Program Flow Control - Loops
6. Lists, Tuples
7. Dictionaries
8. Sets
9. Midterm Exam
10. Function Design
11. Function Arguments
12. Anonymous Functions and Variable Scope
13. Module Design and Usage
14. File Reading, Writing, and Organization
15. Exception Handling
16. Final Exam
17. Final Individual Cross-Disciplinary Project
18. Final Individual Cross-Disciplinary Project
======
Notes:
1. This course uses English materials.
2. Course Github repository:
https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/1111-python-programming
. This repository will be set to private after the start of the semester, and students will be invited to join using their school email accounts.
3. Course Github community discussion area:
https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/Python-Community/discussions
. This community will remain public.
4. Students are required to stay updated with course announcements on Github and participate in online exercises and related assignments. Some course content and learning guides may be subject to rolling adjustments.
5. Course materials, assignment submissions, interactive discussions, and group discussions will all be managed through Github. Students must register for a free Github account and use Github to participate in course discussions.
6. Students who have laptops may bring their own for classes, or use the computers in the computer lab to complete assignments.
7. To promptly understand students‘ online learning status, this course may collect and analyze students‘ online learning records as part of research.
8. Respect intellectual property rights; use of online multimedia resources requires authorization.
9. Leave of absence, absence, and point deductions shall be handled in accordance with the provisions of Article 4 of the National Central University Regulations.
10. Passcode Card Instructions: https://ncuedu.tw/borglab/priority_passcode_card

textbook.ch: 1. 精通 Python：運用簡單的套件進行現代運算(第二版) (ISBN: 9789865024864)
textbook.en: 1. Introducing Python: Modern Computing in Simple Packages (2nd) (ISBN: 1492051365)

gradMethod.ch:
1. 期中考：40％
2. 期末個人專題：30％
3. AI口試：20％
4. 學習歷程(Github Discussion線上互動討論)：10％
gradMethod.en:
1. Midterm Exam: 40％
2. Final Individual Project: 30％
3. AI Oral Exam: 20％
4. Learning Process (Github Discussion Online Interaction): 10％

ch: 學制:限學士班。系所:限學分學程-人工智慧跨域應用(理)、學分學程-人工智慧跨域應用(文)。
學制:限學士班。系所:限非資訊管理學系、非資訊工程學系。
en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Department:Specialty Program-Cross-disciplinary in AI applications、Specialty Program-Cross-disciplinary in AI applications only.
Type:Undergraduate Program only.Department:Non-Department of Information Management、Non-Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.
